remarks: An element of the unital ring homomorphisms restricted to a subset of unital rings is a unital ring homomorphism.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rhmresel.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RingHom |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
rhmresel $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ F e. ( X H Y ) ) -> F e. ( X RingHom Y ) ) $.
